model.name: TestModel
model.metadata: CREATE FOREIGN TABLE SampleTable ( col01 string, col02 varchar, col03 varbinary, col04 char, col05 boolean, col06 byte, col07 tinyint, col08 short, col09 smallint, col10 integer, col11 serial, col12 long, col13 bigint, col14 float, col15 real, col16 double, col17 bigdecimal, col18 decimal, col19 date, col20 time, col21 timestamp );
